shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.
shows.creator: The Duffer Brothers

shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
shows.creator: Vince Gilligan

shows.title: The Crown
shows.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.
shows.creator: Peter Morgan

shows.title: The Witcher
shows.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
shows.creator: Lauren Schmidt Hissrich

shows.title: The Queen's Gambit
shows.description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.
shows.creator: Scott Frank, Allan Scott

shows.title: Squid Game
shows.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.
shows.creator: Hwang Dong-hyuk

shows.title: Money Heist
shows.description: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.
shows.creator: Álex Pina

shows.title: Dark
shows.description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
shows.creator: Baran bo Odar, Jantje Friese

shows.title: Wednesday
shows.description: Wednesday Addams is sent to Nevermore Academy, a bizarre boarding school where she attempts to master her psychic powers, solve a murder mystery, and adjust to new relationships.
shows.creator: Alfred Gough, Miles Millar

shows.title: Bridgerton
shows.description: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.
shows.creator: Chris Van Dusen

shows.title: Peaky Blinders
shows.description: A gangster family epic set in Birmingham, England, following a gang's rise to power during the aftermath of World War I.
shows.creator: Steven Knight

shows.title: The Last of Us
shows.description: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.
shows.creator: Craig Mazin, Neil Druckmann

shows.title: Succession
shows.description: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.
shows.creator: Jesse Armstrong

shows.title: The Bear
shows.description: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop after the suicide of his brother.
shows.creator: Christopher Storer

shows.title: Game of Thrones
shows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
shows.creator: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss

shows.title: Yellowstone
shows.description: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.
shows.creator: Taylor Sheridan, John Linson

shows.title: Ozark
shows.description: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.
shows.creator: Bill Dubuque, Mark Williams

shows.title: The Boys
shows.description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
shows.creator: Eric Kripke

shows.title: Severance
shows.description: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.
shows.creator: Dan Erickson

shows.title: Ted Lasso
shows.description: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.
shows.creator: Bill Lawrence, Jason Sudeikis, Brendan Hunt, Joe Kelly

shows.title: Manifest
shows.description: A commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years. As those aboard reintegrate into society, they experience guiding voices and visions of events yet to occur.
shows.creator: Jeff Rake

shows.title: From
shows.description: In a nightmarish town in middle America, residents find themselves trapped and must unravel the mystery of their situation while fighting to escape.
shows.creator: John Griffin

shows.title: Fallout
shows.description: In a retrofuturistic world devastated by nuclear war, residents of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the irradiated hellscape their ancestors left behind.
shows.creator: Jonathan Nolan, Lisa Joy

shows.title: Beef
shows.description: Two strangers get involved in a road rage incident that escalates into a full-blown feud, drawing them into each other's lives.
shows.creator: Lee Sung Jin

shows.title: Twin Peaks
shows.description: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.
shows.creator: Mark Frost, David Lynch

shows.title: The Office
shows.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
shows.creator: Greg Daniels

shows.title: The Sopranos
shows.description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.
shows.creator: David Chase

shows.title: True Detective
shows.description: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
shows.creator: Nic Pizzolatto

shows.title: Band of Brothers
shows.description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.
shows.creator: Steven Spielberg, Tom Hanks

shows.title: Chernobyl
shows.description: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.
shows.creator: Craig Mazin
